Room.Name: Entrance to Mud School
Room.Description: This is the entrance to the Merc Mud School. Go north to go through mud school. If you have been here before and want to go directly to the arena, go south. A sign warns 'You may not pass these doors once you have passed level 5.'

Exit.Description: You see the doorway into the Mud School Building.
You see the Temple of Midgaard.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The exits are west and south. A small plaque is on the wall.

Exit.Description: You see a path into another room.
You see a path into another room.

ExtraDescription.Description: This zone (Mud School) is created by Hatchet for any Merc Mud. Copyright 1992, 1993.

Equipment check time! Type 'EQUIPMENT' to see your current equipment. Right now, you have just a vest, a shield, and a weapon. As you go through Mud School you will acquire a complete set of equipment. To pick up items on the ground as you see them, type 'GET item'. To wear a piece of armor, type 'WEAR item'. To hold a light source, type 'HOLD item'. To wield a weapon, type 'WIELD weapon'. To wear, hold, and wield everything you have, type 'WEAR ALL'. To stop using a piece of equipment, type 'REMOVE item'. Finally, to see the items in your inventory, type 'INVENTORY'. When you are ready to continue, go west.

Room.Name: The Center Room
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. Exits lead in ALL directions.

Exit.Description: You see the room north that will lead you to the next section.
You see a room.
You see a room.
You see a room.
You see a room.
You see a room.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is the direction practicing room. The directions you can go in any room are: north, south, east, west, up, or down. Of course, not all rooms have all exits available. To see the obvious exits in a room, type 'EXITS'. Sometimes doors are closed, or locked, or secret. Then you have to notice clues in the room description, or try going into that direction and seeing if you bump into a door. Try going into each direction from here. When you are done, go NORTH.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. Exits lead north and south.

Exit.Description: You see the next station ahead.
You see the central room.

ExtraDescription.Description: Since you are here, let us have another lesson. You can see the statistics on yourself by typing 'SCORE'. Do that right now. At higher levels, 'SCORE' gives you more information.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The only exit is east.

Exit.Description: You see the central room.

ExtraDescription.Description: Just go east to the central room.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The only exit is north.

Exit.Description: You see the central room.

ExtraDescription.Description: Just go north to the central room.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The only exit is up.

Exit.Description: You see the central room.

ExtraDescription.Description: Just go up to the central room.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The only exit is down.

Exit.Description: You see the central room.

ExtraDescription.Description: Just go down to the central room.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. Exits reach west and down.

Exit.Description: You see the next station of Mud School.
You see a cage.

ExtraDescription.Description: Welcome to combat training. The first lesson is knowing whom to fight. Use the command 'CONSIDER' to consider killing a monster. Avoid fighting monsters that will kill you easily. The second lesson is running away. There is a monster in the room down. He is too strong for you to kill, but he won't kill you. So go 'DOWN' from here, then 'CONSIDER' him, then 'KILL' him. After a while, type 'FLEE' to escape from him. You can also set your character to flee automatically with the 'WIMPY' command. Type 'HELP WIMPY' to find out more about 'WIMPY'. After you flee, you will be back in this room. When you are ready to go on to the next station, go 'WEST'.

Room.Name: The Blob Cage
Room.Description: You are in a smelly cage. Strangely, the walls are still clean! You see a sign here. The only exit is up.

Exit.Description: You see a safe room up.

ExtraDescription.Description: Remember, don't fight the blob to the finish! Just type 'KILL BLOB', then when you are fighting, type 'FLEE', until you flee and are out of here.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall.

Exit.Description: You see the next station of Mud School.
You see the combat hall.

ExtraDescription.Description: Welcome to the next station. Here, you will actually fight real monsters, without fleeing! Kill every mob, since they hold some equipment you need. To start, go down.

Room.Name: The Cage Room
Room.Description: You are in the cage room. All around are 4 cages. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a big sign on the wall. Exits lead into the cardinal directions plus down.

Exit.Description: You see the aggressive monster inside!
You see the unmodified monster inside!
You see the wimpy monster inside!
You see the aggressive wimpy monster inside!
You see the next station below.

ExtraDescription.Description: Welcome to the cage room. The adepts of mud school have captured some monsters for you to kill. In the four cages are four monsters of various types. Kill them all! After you kill each monster, get all of the equipment from their corpses with the command 'GET ALL CORPSE'. You can then use the command 'WEAR ALL' to wear your newly won equipment. When you are done with the corpse, 'SACRIFICE CORPSE' to give it to your God. God will reward you for this. Between combat, you may need to rest or sleep to regenerate hit points. You can 'REST' to regenerate hit points, or you can 'SLEEP'. 'SLEEP' will refresh you faster than 'REST', but you will be less aware of your surroundings.

Room.Name: A Cage
Room.Description: You are in a cage. Blood and gore are everywhere. The keepers must be lax in the upkeep here! There is a sign on the wall. The only exit is south.

Exit.Description: You see the Cage Room.

ExtraDescription.Description: There is an aggressive monster in this room. Kill him and get out of here fast! Remember to loot and sacrifice the corpse.

Room.Name: A Cage
Room.Description: You are in a cage. Blood and gore are everywhere. The keepers must be lax in the upkeep here! There is a sign on the wall. The only exit is east.

Exit.Description: You see the Cage Room.

ExtraDescription.Description: There is a wimpy, aggressive monster in this room. Kill him and get out of here fast! Remember to loot and sacrifice the corpse.

Room.Name: A Cage
Room.Description: You are in a cage. Blood and gore are everywhere. The keepers must be lax in the upkeep here! There is a sign on the wall. The only exit is north.

Exit.Description: You see the Cage Room.

ExtraDescription.Description: There is a wimpy monster in this room. Kill him and get out of here fast! Remember to loot and sacrifice the corpse.

Room.Name: A Cage
Room.Description: You are in a cage. Blood and gore are everywhere. The keepers must be lax in the upkeep here! There is a sign on the wall. The only exit is west.

Exit.Description: You see the Cage Room.

ExtraDescription.Description: There is a monster in this room. Kill him and get out of here fast! Remember to loot and sacrifice the corpse.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. Find your own exit here.

Exit.Description: You see the next station of Mud School.
You see the Shop.
You see the Cage room.

ExtraDescription.Description: By now, you must be hungry and thirsty. Time to buy groceries! To the south is a store. Inside the store, you can use these commands: BUY Buy an item LIST List what is for sale After buying some food and drink, you can 'EAT' and 'DRINK' it. After that, find the next exit yourself.

Room.Name: The Store in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a cramped room. Stacked neatly on shelves everywhere are items and packages. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The only exit is north.

Exit.Description: You see the only exit out of here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign reads: Buy - Buy something from the storekeeper. List - The storekeeper will tell you what's for sale. Value - The storekeeper will tell you how much he will give to you for that item. Sell - Sell that item to the storekeeper.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The exits are north and west, with a door to the east.

Exit.Description: You see a darkened room inside.
You see the next station of Mud School.
You see the room you just came from.

ExtraDescription.Description: North of you is a dark room. I hope you still have the lantern! If not, you have to back to the store and buy one. In the room is a monster with a key that you need. After killing the monster and getting the key, come back here, UNLOCK EAST, OPEN EAST, and continue east.

Room.Name: The Darkened Room
Room.Description: This room was purposefully darkened so that you would need to hold on to a light source to go through. The walls are, of course, blank, and white. The only exit is south.

Exit.Description: You see the room that you have come from.

Room.Name: The End of Mud School!
Room.Description: This is a very bright room, with a marble pedestal in the center. Behind the pedestal stands a person cloaked in Silver. Tapestries flow from every wall, and you feel very happy to be here right now. There is a big sign here. The only exit is on the other side of the gate north of you.

Exit.Description: You see the Arena ahead.

ExtraDescription.Description: You have graduated from Mud School! Take your diploma...if you can. Go 'NORTH' from here to visit our arena. There are plenty of low-level monsters, but DON'T attack other players. If you want to go directly back to the temple at any time, type 'RECALL'. Don't forget to type save to protect your character. You won't be saved after quitting until you reach level 2, so also type save before you type quit. If you need more help during the game, type 'HELP'. If you see something wrong or have comments, use 'BUG', 'IDEA', or 'TYPO' to report them. May your visit here be ... mercenary.

Room.Name: Southern Wall of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Southern Wall of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Center of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim. \nThere is a BIG sign here for you to look at.

Exit.Description: You see a dark murky dungeon below.

ExtraDescription.Description: Those with high bravery or low senses of cautiousness might wish to go below to the Dungeon. However, know that there are aggressive monsters down there, and there is no quick escape back out of here when you are in the dungeon.

Room.Name: Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Within The Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Within The Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Within The Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: The Center of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are in the center of a large room. A faint light from above shows that the floors are all covered with slime. A feeling of dread comes over you as you notice that this is NOT a great place to go. Exits go in all directions. Of special note is the one that brings you back up!!!

Exit.Description: You see the north wall.
You see the east wall.
You see the south wall.
You see the west wall.
You see safety!

Room.Name: The North West Corner of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are against a wall in the dungeon. It is quite dark here. The lack of any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

Exit.Description: You see the north wall.
You see the south wall.

Room.Name: The North Wall of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are against a wall in the dungeon. It is quite dark here. The lack of any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

Exit.Description: You see the north east corner.
You see the center of the dungeon.
You see the north west corner.

Room.Name: The North East Corner of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are against a wall in the dungeon. It is quite dark here. The lack of any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

Exit.Description: You see the east wall.
You see the north wall.

Room.Name: The West Wall of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are against a wall in the dungeon. It is quite dark here. The lack of any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

Exit.Description: You see the north west corner.
You see the center of the dungeon.
You see the south west corner.

Room.Name: The East Wall of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are against a wall in the dungeon. It is quite dark here. The lack of any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

Exit.Description: You see the north east corner.
You see the south east corner.
You see the center of the dungeon.

Room.Name: The South West Corner of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are against a wall in the dungeon. It is quite dark here. The lack of any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

Exit.Description: You see the north wall.
You see the south wall.

Room.Name: The South Wall of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are against a wall in the dungeon. It is quite dark here. The lack of any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

Exit.Description: You see the center of the dungeon.
You see the south east corner.
You see the south west corner.

Room.Name: The South East Corner of the Dungeon
Room.Description: You are against a wall in the dungeon. It is quite dark here. The lack of any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

Exit.Description: You see the east wall.
You see the south wall.

Room.Name: A Room in Mud School
Room.Description: You are in a room in Mud School. Paintings of the heroic graduates of mud school adorn the walls. To the west is Furey's Training Room, and to the east is Zump's Guild Room. North of you is the next Station of Mud School. There is a sign on the wall (type 'LOOK SIGN' to read it).

Exit.Description: You see the next station of Mud School.
You see Zump's Guild Room. Go there to practice your skills.
You see the entrance to Mud School.
You see Furey's Training Room. Go there to train your attributes.

ExtraDescription.Description: To find out your attributes, type 'score'. You can improve your attributes in Furey's Training Room to the west. You can practice your skills and spells in Zump's Guild Room to the east. You can continue through mud school by going north. If you are a new character, you should go 'WEST' from here, train your abilities, and then come back here and go 'NORTH'.

Room.Name: Furey's Training Room
Room.Description: You are in Furey's Training Room. Around you are all sorts of physical and mental training tools. The whole room is filled with magic, holiness, and sweat. There is a sign on the wall.

Exit.Description: You see the room you came from, and the room you should go to.

ExtraDescription.Description: Welcome to Furey's Training Room. Here you can train your attributes. To train an attribute, you need enough practices. To find out how many practice sessions you have, type 'train' while you are in this room. To train for a specific attribute, type 'train <attr>' where attr is the first 3 letters of the attribute you want increased. Type 'help train' for more information.

Room.Name: Zump's Guild Room
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with weapons, books, and many combat dummies, some cut and stabbed many times, others burnt to a crisp. The room is filled with sweat and an aura of magic. There is a sign on the wall.

Exit.Description: You see the room you came from and the room you should go to.

ExtraDescription.Description: Welcome to Zump's Guild Room. Here you will learn your skills and spells. To find out what skills and spells you can practice and how many practice sessions you have, type 'practice'. To practice the specific skill, type 'practice <skill>', where 'skill' is the skill or spell you wish to practice. Practicing increases the amount you know of that skill or spell, up to a certain maximum. When you have practiced all you wish to practice, go west.

Room.Name: The Air Above the Mud School
Room.Description: You may type the word 'down' to go down. You may type 'help [keyword]' to get help on a topic. Some basic commands are 'look', the directions('north', 'east', 'south', 'west', 'up', 'down') 'inventory', 'wear', 'equipment', 'consider [target]' 'scan [direction]'

Room.Name: Western Wall of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Western Wall of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Northern Wall of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Northern Wall of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim. The entrance to the school is north of here.

Room.Name: Northern Wall of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: Northern Wall of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: North East Corner of the Arena
Room.Description: This arena is a great place for new adventurers to learn the basics of combat and to build confidence in their abilities, before moving on to more challenging places with stronger monsters. A variety of "wimpy" monsters make their home here, waiting for someone to come kill them. The stone floors here are rough and the lighting is dim.

Room.Name: An Alcove in the North West Corner of the Arena
An Alcove in the Western Wall of the Arena
An Alcove in the Western Wall of the Arena
An Hidden Space in the North East Corner of the Arena
An Alcove in the Northern Wall of the Arena
An Alcove in the Northern Wall of the Arena
An Alcove in the Eastern Wall of the Arena

NPC.name: acolyte cleric
NPC.description: He's big and bad. Don't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: An acolyte of Zump welcomes you to mud school.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior NoPurge AreaAttack

NPC.name: blob
NPC.description: He is big, he is bad. You don't want to fight him when he isn't chained up. Perhaps now would be a good time to flee from him!!! If you don't flee, you would really suffer the consequences.
NPC.longDescription: The blob is here, waiting to eat you up.

NPC.name: monster
NPC.description: He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since he is leashed up, and you are not.
NPC.longDescription: There is a monster leashed here.

NPC.name: monster wimpy
NPC.description: He looks wimpy. You feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since he is leashed up, and you are not.
NPC.longDescription: There is a wimpy monster leashed here.

NPC.name: monster aggressive
NPC.description: He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since he is leashed up, and you are not.
NPC.longDescription: There is an aggressive monster leashed here.

NPC.name: monster wimpy aggressive
NPC.description: He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since he is leashed up, and you are not.
NPC.longDescription: There is a wimpy aggressive monster leashed here.

NPC.name: big creature
NPC.description: He looks mean, and you just might have a small problem killing him, but he looks like a great prize!!!
NPC.longDescription: There is a big creature hulking over your form.

NPC.name: adept cleric
NPC.description: She is big and bad. Don't mess with her.
NPC.longDescription: An adept of the mighty goddess Satin is here, contemplating your progress.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior NoPurge AreaAttack

NPC.name: adept
NPC.description: He is big and bad. Don't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: An adept of Alander is here, smiling at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior NoPurge AreaAttack

NPC.name: rabbit
NPC.description: The rabbit smiles at you, completely harmless!
NPC.longDescription: A rabbit is bouncing around here.

NPC.name: lizard
NPC.description: It smiles at you, and tries to eat your leg.
NPC.longDescription: A lizard slithers up to you.

NPC.name: boar
NPC.description: It grunts at you.
NPC.longDescription: A boar tries to run you over.

NPC.name: fox
NPC.description: It's fur might be worth money.
NPC.longDescription: A fox is here staring at you.

NPC.name: snail
NPC.description: You don't see much but slime about it.
NPC.longDescription: A snail is trying to get out of your way.

NPC.name: beast
NPC.description: It looks mean. You'd better run.
NPC.longDescription: A beast tries to feed off of you.

NPC.name: bear
NPC.description: The bear must be bigger than you! It wants to rip your head off.
NPC.longDescription: A bear is here growling at you.

NPC.name: wolf
NPC.description: The wolf doesn't want to be bothered.
NPC.longDescription: A wolf is here snarling at you.

NPC.name: adept cleric
NPC.description: He is big and bad. Don't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: An adept of Selene is here, grinning and selling you things.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Cleric Warrior NoPurge AreaAttack Shopkeeper

NPC.name: adept cleric
NPC.description: He is big and bad. Don't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: An adept of Furey is here, training young students.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Gain Cleric Warrior NoPurge AreaAttack

NPC.name: priest cleric
NPC.description: He is big and bad. Don't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: The priest of Circe is ready to help you practice.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger GuildMaster NoPurge AreaAttack

NPC.name: diploma beast
NPC.description: This horrible creature is your final test for mud school. Kill him, and the diploma is yours.
NPC.longDescription: The hideous diploma beast is here, holding your graduation present!

Quest.Name: newbie_use_lever
Quest.Description: Use the lever in the northwest alcove of the arena
